ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 18
ygData.msgSnippet: WTH, we both ended messages with smilies?  We better be careful, I m already starting to find points where we agree.  see post on PvP binding. =) ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
WTH, we both ended messages with smilies? We better be careful, I'm already
starting to find points where we agree. see post on PvP binding. =)

----- Original Message -----
From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 10:23 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18


> From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>

with

the -PvPs.
> > > > > ...also... so far.. in my clan... I've never been logged on
for
> > more
> > > > > than half an hour, and never had to play solo. I have solo'd...
but
> > > > >always
> > > > > have to opportunity to group.
> > > >
> > > > I think you can see the contradiction here. Obviously, you don't
like
> > > > anyone.
